sentences.english: Particularly he play with arts, and don't pursuit fame and secular.
sentences.chinese: 特别是他“玩儿”艺术，不求功名，不问市侩。

sentences.english: The academic honor plot nightmare which creates by the imperial civil service examination adheres to stickcohere equally likely on their body.
sentences.chinese: 由科举造成的功名情节像梦魇一样附着在他们身上。

sentences.english: The achievement of Huizhou scholar was another rich fruits.
sentences.chinese: 众多徽州文人所获的功名，则是捐资兴教的又一硕果。

sentences.english: People tend to read as to obtain title-stepping stone, knocked at the door of the brick.
sentences.chinese: 世人往往将读书当成求取功名的进身之阶，敲门之砖。

sentences.english: One is his positive in business, pursue the attitude of the merit and fame.
sentences.chinese: 一是他的积极于仕途，追求功名的态度。

sentences.english: Underlings always follow his order and advice. Here the official rank symbolizes power and interest.
sentences.chinese: 因此，功名及地位在这里就代表了权力及利益。

sentences.english: We should not prostrate ourselves before rank and wealth.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不能拜倒在功名与财富脚下。
